message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, even exceeding the value it currently holds for you.
I'm really interested in the product, but $15,000 is a bit out of my budget. I'd be willing to pay $10,000 for it.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  While I value your offer, $10,000 is quite a bit lower than I'm aiming for. Could you do $13,000?
I understand that you're looking for a higher price, but I'm really trying to keep costs down. I'd be willing to pay $11,000 for the product.
